t: Amazon Resale: Understanding Product Conditions - Amazon Customer Service

t: Marketplace Items Condition Guidelines - Amazon Customer Service
s: To help you make the best buying ... see the conditions sellers use to describe their items: The following guidelines apply to all product categories unless otherwise indicated within specific categories. New: Just like it sounds. A brand-new item. Original manufacturer's warranty, if any, still applies, with warranty details included in the listing comments. t: What are Amazon condition guidelines? - Sell on Amazon
s: March 10, 2025 - Amazon’s general condition guidelines were created with both sellers and customers in mind. They help support transparency and clarity around the use and quality of specific items. Before you select a condition for an item, it’s important to thoroughly inspect it for signs of use.

t: Searching and Browsing for Items - Amazon Customer Service
s: Are you looking for a specific item? Enter a few words into the search box and select the magnifying glass icon. We'll show you the matching results.

t: New, Used-Like New, or Renewed: What condition guidelines mean (and why they’re important)
s: Below we’ve listed an overview of the condition types, to ensure you always pick the correct condition for your products: New: Just like it sounds—this is a brand-new item in perfect condition.
